update purchase_info
commodity_id = #{commodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
buyer_id = #{buyerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=NUMERIC},

update purchase_info set commodity_id = #{commodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buyer_id = #{buyerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, unit_price = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_weight = #{unitWeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_location_id = #{receiveLocationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receive_start_time = #{receiveStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, receive_end_time = #{receiveEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, "status" = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, contact_user_name = #{contactUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purchase_id = #{purchaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from purchase_info where buyer_id=#{buyserId} and status!=0
and id < (select id from purchase_info where purchase_id=#{purchaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
and id <= (select max (id) from purchase_info )
order by id desc limit #{pgSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
